name: Desserts and Deep Talks
description: Your kind of people are a lot closer to home than you might think. Come for the dessert, stay for the deep talks!
map: Cream n Sugar Cafe, 8910 Yonge St, Richmond Hill, ON L4C 0L7
whatToBring: Make sure you have your vaccine passport and photo ID on hand.
whenYouArrive: Send me an email if you have trouble finding us.
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance.

name: Escape rooms are back!
description: Immerse yourself in another world and test your escape room skills, then grab some hot/cold beverages at a nearby Tim Hortons, all with a group of new friends. What more can one ask of a Sunday afternoon? Please keep in mind that booking is subject to reaching a minimum number of six registered individuals. A $40.00 payment by Wednesday October 13 will reserve your spot, fully refundable should the event be cancelled.
map: Escape from the 6, 3600A Laird Rd unit 3, Mississauga, ON L5L 6A6, Canada
whatToBring: Bring your vaccine document, ID, and an openness to connect :)
whenYouArrive: Look for the girl with purple/blue nails, blonde hair and bangs.
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance and fully refunded.

name: Autumn Hike
description: Forget returning to the office, I'm about returning to the forest. If you gawk at colourful leaves and hidden mushrooms bring you joy, meet me under the canopy.
map: Vista Trail Trailhead, Rouge National Urban Park
whatToBring: Active wear, some snacks, probably a sweater, and plenty of water.
whenYouArrive: We'll meet in the parking lot and head out on the Vista Trail to get the best views.
additionalDetails: Parking is free! You can also reach the park by TTC and the GO train from Union Station. If people want to carpool, send me an email, and we'll try to coordinate.
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance.

name: Fall Beach Volleyball
description: Come play this classic team sport while enjoying the beautiful scenery of Lake Wilcox Park. All skill levels are welcome for this fun afternoon of friendly competition!
map: Oak Ridges Community Park, Bayview Park Ln, Richmond Hill, ON L4E 5A7
whatToBring: The weather will be a bit cool so be sure to bring a sweater or jacket just in case, but we'll moving around so you may not need it!
whenYouArrive: When you arrive, we will meet right on the volleyball courts. I will bring a volleyball and pump. The volleyball court is sand so be sure to wear comfortable footwear. I want everyone to feel welcome and have fun regardless of skill level, so we will do our best to create evenly-matched teams (I'm not a good player either!).
additionalDetails: There is parking available, a 1-minute walk north of the park. If anyone needs a ride, I'm happy to drive a few people! Just email me a few days beforehand to let me know. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me as well.
cancellation: If you need to cancel, please let us know at team@humeone.com. If the event is cancelled for any reason, you will be notified at least 24 hours in advance.
